prospect_info.name: Arjun Malhotra
prospect_info.context_from_post:
One lesson I didn’t expect to learn this week:

Starting strong matters less than recovering well.

My pitch didn’t begin perfectly.
I was nervous.
The first few seconds were slow.

Then I stopped performing
and started explaining.

I missed the sequence,
but I didn’t miss the truth.

That taught me something bigger than pitching:

Startups won’t start perfectly.
What matters is how quickly you regain clarity.

Not panic.
Not ego.
Just adjustment.

If you’re a student founder —
don’t wait to feel confident.
Learn to recover.

campaign_context.campaign_name: Hiring frontend lead for fintech platform
campaign_context.description: A strategic outreach campaign targeting Senior Full Stack Developers to scale our core platform team.
campaign_context.why_approaching: Hiring for 'Senior Full Stack Engineer (Node.js & React)' role requiring 5 years exp. Location: Pune, Maharashtra (Hybrid). Skills: "JavaScript/TypeScript",       "React.js",       "Node.js",       "PostgreSQL",       "AWS Services"
